full_summary:
# Standard Laser Speed Measurement Equipment

**Title:** Standard LASER/LIDAR Speed-Measuring Equipment

**Reference Number:** cb-6471-63443089

**Publication Date:** June 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 9, 2023 2:00:00 PM

## Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police seeks a Standing Offer for the provision of Standard LASER/LIDAR speed-measuring equipment to enforce vehicle speed regulations across Canada. The offer period will be one year plus three (3) additional extension periods of one (1) year each.

## Operational Requirements

The RCMP requires a LASER device to meet operational needs. This Standing Offer is for the Standard LASER device. The anticipated deployment locations are across Canada, including areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

## Delivery and Scheduling

All deliverables must be received within 14 calendar days from receipt of a call-up against the Standing Offer.

## Technical Evaluation Criteria

To be considered responsive, an offer must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria outlined in the solicitation.

## Method of Purchase

The GRC has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada and applies the integrity provisions in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.

## Contact Information

The Bid Receiving Unit is located at:

Anouk St-Aubin
Senior Procurement Officer
HQ Procurement and Contracting Branch
Royal Canadian Mounted Police
73 Lekin Dr, Mailstop #1
Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
(438) 462-2984
anouk.st-aubin@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents

Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information. Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Tender submissions must be made in either official language of Canada.

## Important Notes

* The Standing Offer may be subject to the Ta'an Kwach'an Council Final Agreement, Kwanlin Dun First Nation Final Agreement, and Tsawwassen First Nation Final Agreement.
* There is another Standing Offer for Compact LASER Speed Measurement Equipment, 202200845. Offerors may submit offers for one or both Standing Offers.
* Integrity Regime: Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Request for Standing Offer Documents: Available for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabu
